snippet.title: Sonic Riders: Zero Gravity "Regravitified" | Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Our new venture led by Yacker of the dev team! This mod is essentially the "tournament edition" treatment for Zero Gravity. If you wish to flex your knowledge in extreme gear, then by all means, join the discord and show us what you're made of. The Ark of the Cosmos awaits you!

Grab the RG mod in the ZG cord: https://discord.gg/6xwfaZc
Grab the OG mod in the TE cord: https://discord.gg/GPgZdKq

Support creator and lead developer of this project Yacker:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgZ3MSAZtkziXF-TrlnQrRA

Editing was done by Odd-Eyes Von. SFX & outro by Protag. Support them here:
Odd-Eyes Von: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZjPI5jHPfNgplmS0Lj1rZA
Protag: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCpaVn6Iu5_MHVIwAaTlWIbw
